---
title: "Newsletter"
---

We create an Openscapes Newsletter 4x / year. It is published as a blog post with tag `newsletter` and emailed to the newsletter subscribers mailing list.

The **newsletter mailing list** is a Google Group. People can [subscribe via Google Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd25jpfiAn1gYNwUPcfMVudsL625_pYbKsqxXpRazHCL6QA7g/viewform?usp=sf_link)
